batchmolds:blockcraftdesc-batchmold-*-ra: To cast a batch of metal ingots for storage or later use on the anvil
batchmolds:block-batchmold-blue-raw-smal: Raw blue clay 3 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-fire-raw-smal: Raw fire clay 3 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-red-raw-small: Raw red clay 3 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-blue-fired-sm: Dark brown ceramic 3 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-blue-raw-medi: Raw blue clay 4 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-fire-raw-medi: Raw fire clay 4 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-red-raw-mediu: Raw red clay 4 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-blue-fired-me: Dark brown ceramic 4 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-blue-raw-larg: Raw blue clay 12 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-fire-raw-larg: Raw fire clay 12 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-red-raw-large: Raw red clay 12 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-batchmold-blue-fired-la: Dark brown ceramic 12 ingot batch mold
batchmolds:block-handbooktext-batchmolds: Caution: Getting a mold with molten metal in it wet will cause the mold to shatter, and you will lose some of the metal.
